name: Anglophy.me
tagline: Transform a site to UK English
body:
## 'Ello 'Ello 'Ello
**Anglophy.js** is a small script to translate websites from American English to British English (or the other way around).  

## Requirements
Anglophy.js requires [jQuery](http://jquery.com)

## Usage
To use anglophy.js, simply [download the script](https://github.com/bryanstedman/anglophy.js/archive/master.zip) and include it in your site after jquery. Then when you visit the site, add the url parameter `?en=uk`
```
example.com?en=uk
```

Similarly, if you'd like to translate in the opposite direction, from British English to American English, you can use the url parameter `?en=us` or, if you are feeling particularly cheeky (hi @imyke), you can use `?en=simplified`
```
example.com?en=us
```

Changes only occur on text elements so your class names and styles are safe.

## Version
* Version 1.0

Chip chip, cheerio!
